Title: The Fingering
Plot: Thad sets off an investigation after being sodomized during a practice when he tried returning an interception despite most of the team trying to stop him. Sammy meets a former BMS mascot from the 1990s who is now homeless and has been watching practices.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
GuestStars: Omari Newton, Rob Ramsay, James Cade, Meghan Heffern
